sentences.en: And thus gradually the scheme so laboriously put together unraveled.
sentences.cn: 这样一来,那项经过苦心筹划出来的方案也就此告吹.

sentences.en: He dressed himself laboriously every morning and afternoon.
sentences.cn: 他每天早晨和下午花不少工夫梳洗打扮.

sentences.en: He sat behind a desk laboriously writing with an Army issue pen.
sentences.cn: 他坐在书桌后吃力地写着，用的是一支部队发的钢笔。
他吃力地签上自己的名字.
他很费力地写出那几个字.

sentences.en: He was trudging laboriously on the rugged mountain path.
sentences.cn: 他在崎岖的山路上艰难地行走着.

sentences.en: Laboriously did he describe the genesis of the picnic.
sentences.cn: 他熬费苦心地描绘了这次野餐的根由.

sentences.en: Laboriously the men followed him, strung out along the bank.
sentences.cn: 队伍在靠岸处拉成长长的一串,吃力地跟着他走.

sentences.en: Millstones had been cut and laboriously sledged down the rough mountainsides.
sentences.cn: 石磨被琢好,然后费力用雪橇运下那崎岖不平的山坡.

sentences.en: She is laboriously copying out an old manuscript.
sentences.cn: 她正在费劲地抄出一份旧的手稿。

sentences.en: She saw people avoiding her, and still laboriously smiled upon them.
sentences.cn: 她明明知道别人躲着不愿意睬她, 仍旧努力对她们微笑着打招呼.

sentences.en: Slowly, laboriously, she heaved herself over and pulled her heavy skirts up to her thighs.
sentences.cn: 她缓慢而吃力地抬起身来,将沉重的裙裾拉到大腿以上.

sentences.en: Then Babbitt saw Professor Pumphrey laboriously crawling up hill.
sentences.cn: 这时候,巴比特看到庞弗里教授正吃力地一步一步爬上坡.

sentences.en: Tom was but a slow reader, and passed on laboriously from verse to verse.
sentences.cn: 汤姆念得很慢,他一节一节地往下念去, 感到非常吃力.

words.tran_cn: 辛苦地；费力地；不流畅地

trans.tran_cn: 艰苦地，费力地，辛勤地，（文体等）佶屈聱牙地
